Name: Wolfgate
About the game: Caution this game is not for the casual gamer, if you enjoy hard-core puzzles, difficult boss fights, and out of this world story lines please continue and give Wolfgate a try. A dark and terrible Demon Prince has emerged threatening to wipe out all who are not Demons. Fight through dungeons, solve puzzles, and defeat bosses until you are strong enough to defeat the Demon Prince. Explore the world, as you meet interesting and odd characters. Upgrade your capabilities by spending coin, and XP. Are you ready to shed your mortal self and enter the simple 2D world of Wolfgate! -Enemy Level Up -Level Up -Dodge and Attack -New Game + -Dungeons and Puzzles -Epic Boss Fights -Plot Twists -Hidden Rooms -Side Stories -Update Support thank you for supporting World Dragon Gaming LLC, keep inspiration alive
